verses.verse: I say<WG3004> the truth<WG225> in Christ,<WG5547> I lie<WG5574> not, my conscience<WG4893> also<WG4828> bearing<WG4828> me witness<WG4828> in the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151>
That I have<WG2076> great<WG3173> heaviness<WG3077> and continual<WG88> sorrow<WG3601> in my heart.<WG2588>
For I could wish<WG2172> that myself<WG846> were accursed<WG331> from Christ<WG5547> for my brothers,<WG80> my kinsmen<WG4773> according<WG2596> to the flesh:<WG4561>

Who<WG3748> are Israelites;<WG2475> to whom<WG3739> pertains the adoption,<WG5206> and the glory,<WG1391> and the covenants,<WG1242> and the giving<WG3548> of the law,<WG3548> and the service<WG2999> of God, and the promises;<WG1860>

Whose<WG3739> are the fathers,<WG3962> and of whom<WG3739> as concerning<WG2596> the flesh<WG4561> Christ<WG5547> came, who<WG3588> is over<WG1909> all,<WG3956> God<WG2316> blessed<WG2128> for ever.<WG165> Amen.<WG281>
Not as though<WG3754> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> has taken none<WG1601> effect.<WG1601> For they are not all<WG3956> Israel,<WG2474> which<WG3588> are of Israel:<WG2474>
Neither,<WG3761> because<WG3754> they are the seed<WG4690> of Abraham,<WG11> are they all<WG3956> children:<WG5043> but, In Isaac<WG2464> shall your seed<WG4690> be called.<WG2564>

That is, They which are the children<WG5043> of the flesh,<WG4561> these<WG5023> are not the children<WG5043> of God:<WG2316> but the children<WG5043> of the promise<WG1860> are counted<WG3049> for the seed.<WG4690>
For this<WG3778> is the word<WG3056> of promise,<WG1860> At<WG2596> this<WG5126> time<WG2540> will I come,<WG2064> and Sarah<WG4564> shall have<WG2071> a son.<WG5207>
And not only<WG3440> this; but when Rebecca<WG4479> also<WG2532> had conceived<WG2845> <WG2192> by one,<WG1520> even by our father<WG3962> Isaac;<WG2464>

(For the children being not yet<WG3380> born,<WG1080> neither<WG3366> having done<WG4238> any<WG5100> good<WG18> or<WG2228> evil,<WG2556> that the purpose<WG4286> of God<WG2316> according<WG2596> to election<WG1589> might stand,<WG3306> not of works,<WG2041> but of him that calls;<WG2564>)
It was said<WG4483> to her, The elder<WG3187> shall serve<WG1398> the younger.<WG1640>
As it is written,<WG1125> Jacob<WG2384> have<WG2071> I loved,<WG25> but Esau<WG2269> have<WG2071> I hated.<WG3404>
What<WG5101> shall we say<WG2046> then?<WG3767> Is there unrighteousness<WG93> with God?<WG2316> God<WG3361> <WG1096> forbid.<WG3361> <WG1096>
For he said<WG3004> to Moses,<WG3475> I will have mercy<WG1653> on whom<WG3739> I will have mercy,<WG1653> and I will have compassion<WG3627> on whom<WG3739> I will have compassion.<WG3627>
So<WG686> then<WG686> it is not of him that wills,<WG2309> nor<WG3761> of him that runs,<WG5143> but of God<WG2316> that shows<WG1653> mercy.<WG1653>

For the scripture<WG1124> said<WG3004> to Pharaoh,<WG5328> Even for this<WG5124> same<WG846> purpose have I raised<WG1825> you up, that I might show<WG1731> my power<WG1411> in you, and that my name<WG3686> might be declared<WG1229> throughout<WG1722> all<WG3956> the earth.<WG1093>
Therefore<WG686> <WG3767> has he mercy<WG1653> on whom<WG3739> he will<WG2309> have mercy, and whom<WG3739> he will<WG2309> he hardens.<WG4645>
You will say<WG2046> then<WG3767> to me, Why<WG5101> does he yet<WG2089> find fault?<WG3201> For who<WG5101> has resisted<WG436> his will?<WG1013>

No<WG3304> but, O man,<WG444> who<WG5101> are<WG1488> you that reply<WG470> against<WG470> God?<WG2316> Shall the thing<WG4110> formed<WG4110> say<WG2046> to him that formed<WG4110> it, Why<WG5101> have you made<WG4160> me thus?<WG3779>
Has<WG2192> not the potter<WG2763> power<WG1849> over the clay,<WG4081> of the same<WG846> lump<WG5445> to make<WG4160> one vessel<WG4632> to honor,<WG5092> and another<WG3739> to dishonor?<WG819>

What if<WG1487> God,<WG2316> willing<WG2309> to show<WG1731> his wrath,<WG3709> and to make<WG1107> his power<WG1415> known,<WG1107> endured<WG5342> with much<WG4183> long-suffering<WG3115> the vessels<WG4632> of wrath<WG3709> fitted<WG2675> to destruction:<WG684>

And that he might make<WG1107> known<WG1107> the riches<WG4149> of his glory<WG1391> on<WG1909> the vessels<WG4632> of mercy,<WG1656> which<WG3739> he had before<WG4282> prepared<WG4282> to glory,<WG1391>
Even<WG2532> us, whom<WG3739> he has called,<WG2564> not of the Jews<WG2453> only,<WG3440> but also<WG2532> of the Gentiles?<WG1484>
As he said<WG3004> also<WG2532> in Osee,<WG5617> I will call<WG2564> them my people,<WG2992> which were not my people;<WG2992> and her beloved,<WG25> which was not beloved.<WG25>

And it shall come<WG1511> to pass, that in the place<WG5117> where<WG3757> it was said<WG4483> to them, You are not my people;<WG2992> there<WG1563> shall they be called<WG2564> the children<WG5207> of the living<WG2198> God.<WG2316>

Esaias<WG2268> also<WG1161> cries<WG2896> concerning<WG5228> Israel,<WG2474> Though<WG1437> the number<WG706> of the children<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474> be as the sand<WG285> of the sea,<WG2281> a remnant<WG2640> shall be saved:<WG4982>

For he will finish<WG4931> the work,<WG3056> and cut<WG4932> it short<WG4932> in righteousness:<WG1343> because<WG3754> a short<WG4932> work<WG3056> will the Lord<WG2962> make<WG4160> on the earth.<WG1093>

And as Esaias<WG2268> said<WG4280> before,<WG4280> Except<WG1508> the Lord<WG2962> of Sabaoth<WG4519> had left<WG1459> us a seed,<WG4690> we had been<WG1096> as Sodoma,<WG4670> and been made<WG3666> like<WG3666> to Gomorrha.<WG1116>

What<WG5101> shall we say<WG2046> then?<WG3767> That the Gentiles,<WG1484> which<WG3588> followed<WG1377> not after righteousness,<WG1343> have attained<WG2638> to righteousness,<WG1343> even<WG1161> the righteousness<WG1343> which<WG3588> is of faith.<WG4102>
But Israel,<WG2474> which followed<WG1377> after the law<WG3551> of righteousness,<WG1343> has not attained<WG5348> to the law<WG3551> of righteousness.<WG1343>
Why?<WG1302> Because<WG3754> they sought<WG2212> it not by faith,<WG4102> but as it were by the works<WG2041> of the law.<WG3551> For they stumbled<WG4350> at that stumbling stone;<WG3037>

As it is written,<WG1125> Behold,<WG2400> I lay<WG5087> in Sion<WG4622> a stumbling stone<WG3037> <WG4348> and rock<WG4073> of offense:<WG4625> and whoever<WG3956> <WG3588> believes<WG4100> on<WG1909> him shall not be ashamed.<WG2617>
